#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    char str[100000];
    cin>>str;
    long long int q;
    cin>>q;
    for(long long int p=0;p<q;++p)
    {char ch;
    long long int i,j,k,ctr=0;
    cin>>i>>j>>ch;
    for(k=i-1;k<=j-1;++k)
    {
        if(str[k]==ch)
        ++ctr;
    }
    cout<<ctr<<"\n";}
    return 0;
}
